detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the hem.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Jersey top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Wide blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck and shawl collar. Concealed buttons down the front, a pleat at the back and long puff sleeves with flounced cuffs.
High-waisted tights that lift the bum and shape the waist and thighs. 70 denier.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel in a contrasting colour.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Lace-trimmed jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with an embroidered motif on the front. Straps that button at the front, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems. Jersey lining at the top.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with round toes and a zip in the side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Covered block heels 4.5 cm.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Sleeveless, A-line jersey dress with slightly deeper armholes, pockets in the side seams and a double layer at the top.
Swim top and swim shorts in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.
Gently fitted, calf-length denim dress with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Ankle-length trousers in sturdy, stretch cotton twill with metal buttons at the top, a regular waist, button fly and security button on the inside of the waistband. Side pockets, patch back pockets and straight legs that flare to the hem with sewn-in creases front and back and a slit at the hems.
Tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair in a cable knit and one pair in a rib knit.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside
One-shoulder body in jersey crêpe with flounced trims at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in crisp cotton poplin. Round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Unlined.

Top in airy jersey crêpe with a round neckline and seam down the front. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with pleats and close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.

Romper suit in soft viscose chambray with frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Buttons at the back, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and narrow elastication at the hems.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit with a gentle drape to the hem.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline, button placket and lace chest pocket.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elastic hem. Extra firm support.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top, both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

3-piece set with a shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave and a satin bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with concealed elastication and a button at the waist, a zip fly, front pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details. Bow tie with a narrow, adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative tie detail at the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt with details. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Dress in an airy, lightly crinkled weave with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back, gentle gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam and flounce at the waist, and a wide, floaty skirt with a flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Lined.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cargo shorts in a cotton twill weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Waterproof trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short, fitted dress in stretch viscose jersey with wrapover draping at the bust and long sleeves. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and mesh panels at the back, sides and cuffs. Zipped pocket on one sleeve. Unlined. Size of sleeve pocket 12x16 cm.
Long bandeau dress in an airy weave with draping and a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the bodice. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Cropped off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with long sleeves.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Wide shirt in a soft linen blend with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Sleeveless romper suit and T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, a small chest pocket with appliqués and short legs with elasticated hems. T-shirt with lapped shoulders.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede section on the front and a handle and zip at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps and two zipped outer compartments. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 23 cm. Height 31 cm.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in airy crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a narrow elasticated seam, and a smocked hem. Unlined.
Top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, flared cuffs with a pleat, and a straight-cut hem.
Sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
Earrings in hammered metal with plastic stones. Length 6 cm.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton canvas espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Chunky metal curb chain bracelet with a trigger clasp.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a small V-neck. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Long, padded parka in a cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a single back vent with a drawstring. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, text print on the front and a straight-cut hem.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar that is ribbed on the inside and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket with a press-stud, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidered details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
